author: Chris DeVille
title: Grails – “Pelham”
text:
Chris DeVille @chrisdeville | January 11, 2017 - 10:19 am Share < br />this article: 
Grails graced December with the news that they’d return this year with Chalice Hymnal , their first album since 2011. That announcement arrived alongside the ominously floating title track , and now we get a second preview in the form of “Pelham.” This one is more aggressive and immediate, a rhythmically frantic prog-rock track fit for black-ops helicopter flights. Listen below. 
Chalice Hymnal is out 2/17 on Temporary Residence. Pre-order it here .
